meanings.definition: Unable to speak because of shock or amazement.
meanings.sent1: The little girl was dumbstruck when she saw the magician make a rabbit disappear.
meanings.sent2: The audience was dumbstruck by the breathtaking performance of the acrobat.
meanings.sent3: The dog looked dumbstruck when it saw a cat wearing sunglasses.
meanings.sent4: His incredible magic trick left everyone dumbstruck, as if under a spell.
meanings.sent5: The unexpected plot twist in the movie left the viewers dumbstruck and speechless.

meanings.definition: Filled with astonishment and unable to speak.
meanings.sent1: She was dumbstruck by the beautiful sunset over the ocean.
meanings.sent2: The children were dumbstruck when they saw a shooting star for the first time.
meanings.sent3: The cat's reaction to the vacuum cleaner was truly dumbstruck.
meanings.sent4: The sight of the ancient ruins left the archaeologists dumbstruck with wonder.
meanings.sent5: The unexpected news of winning the lottery left him dumbstruck and overjoyed.
